content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position 9.5, 11.5) for crafting electronic circuits
- Input wooden chest (position 6.5, 11.5) with burner inserter (position 7.5, 11.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 12.5, 11.5) with burner inserter (position 11.5, 11.5)
Current status: Waiting for iron plates and copper cables

### Smelting Area
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) 
- Furnace at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces currently idle with no ingredients

### Power Generation System at position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Boiler (position -7.0, 24.5) generating steam
- Steam engine (position -2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe network carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network distributing power
System is operational and working

### Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab for research
- Input chest (position 0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs
- Burner inserter (position 0.5, 30.5) feeding the lab
Currently has automation and logistic science packs loaded but no active research

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisites Missing
- Ensure all prerequisite technologies are researched before attempting new research:
  - Optics needed before Solar Energy
  - Fluid Handling needed before Oil Processing
  - Engine needed before Fluid Handling
  - Chemical Science Pack needed before Advanced Material Processing 2
  - Lubricant needed before Electric Engine

### Invalid Technology Names
- Use correct technology names from the Technology enum:
  - "Engine", "EngineUnit", and "Optics" are not valid technology names

### Resource Management
- Check inventory for required items before attempting insertion:
  - Ensure coal is available before trying to insert into boiler

### Already Researched Technologies
- Avoid attempting to research already completed technologies:
  - Logistics Science Pack
  - Fast Inserter
  - Automation
  - Automation 2
  - Logistics 2
  - Advanced Material Processing
